General.Name: Jade Marvel Group Bhd
General.Description: Jade Marvel Group Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the asphaltic concrete manufacturing and property development businesses primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through Investment Holdings, Manufacturing, Financing, Constructions, Property Development, Healthcare and Others segments. It also rents properties; manufactures and trades in bituminous premixes, tarmacs, and emulsions. In addition, the company offers money lending and management services; and provides land reclamation work, construction work, and project dealing and management services, as well as provides property development services. Further, it offers business venture of management in wellness industry; and trading of medical devices, and operates quarry sites. Additionally, the company provides transportation, licensed credit community, and business consultancy services. Furthermore, it is involved in sales and services of goods; construction works; trading in seafood; manufacturing asphalt premix; and road marking contract and related road paving work activities. The company engages in owning, developing, and licensing of software and applications; and business development services. It is also involved in provision of online and digital portal management; and beauty products and services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bayan Lepas, Malaysia.
